title: Puzzle children
creator_credit: Bill Davis, Stephen Beck and WQED
brief_description: Discusses learning disabilities in children and identifies some of the myths that prevent an accurate understanding of these problems. Profiles four children with specific learning handicaps. Including comments by their parents, teachers, and special educators. Hosted by Julie Andrews and Bill Bixby.
